snippet: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg was mistaken when he indicated that New York City Football Club would play its home games at Yankee Stadium.
abstract: Mayor Michael R Bloomberg's office says the mayor was mistaken when he indicated in his weekly radio address that New York City Football Club will play its home games at Yankee Stadium.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg was mistaken when he indicated that New York City Football Club would play its home games at Yankee Stadium.

headline.main: Bloomberg Errs in Saying Yankee Stadium Will Be Soccer Team’s Base
headline.print_headline: Mayor Errs in Saying Yankee Stadium Will Be New Team’s Base

keywords.value: New York City Football Club (Soccer Team)
